quote: Her skin glowed in dawn's soft light sneaking in through curtains, and she stretched her arms up toward the ceiling in a move that elongated everything above her waist and below his belt.
quote_letters: HER SKIN GLOWED IN DAWNS SOFT LIGHT SNEAKING IN THROUGH CURTAINS AND SHE STRETCHED HER ARMS UP TOWARD THE CEILING IN A MOVE THAT ELONGATED EVERYTHING ABOVE HER WAIST AND BELOW HIS BELT
